Package view.components.controls

Interface MouvementInputs

All Known Implementing Classes:
ControllerJoystick, Joystick, MouseAndControllerJoystick
public interface MouvementInputs
Describes the inputs used to move the robot.
Author:
TRAFNY Theo - UPSSITECH

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    float computeAngle()
    Compute the current angle to send to the robot
    Vector computeDirection()
    Compute the direction to send to the robot.
    float computeMagnitude()
    Compute the magnitude (as the speed) of the robot to send.
    void update()
    An update method, can be used by children to process others inputs if needed.

  • Method Details

    • computeAngle

      float computeAngle()
      Compute the current angle to send to the robot
      Returns:
      The angle

    • computeMagnitude

      float computeMagnitude()
      Compute the magnitude (as the speed) of the robot to send.
      Returns:
      The magnitude

    • computeDirection

      Vector computeDirection()
      Compute the direction to send to the robot.
      Returns:
      The direction

    • update

      void update()
      An update method, can be used by children to process others inputs if needed.
